constituent: tumour, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, heavy, thousand, ri, computer
koohiiStory1: A tumor is a useless body part that is nothing but heavy.
koohiiStory2: When flesh clumps together and gets heavy, it forms a tumor.
kunYomi: は.れる、は.れ、は.らす、く.む、はれもの
readingExamples: 腫らす (は.らす), 腫れる (は.れる)
words: to swell (from inflammation), to become swollen
